de.tud.cib.bimsage.icdd.activedata

Class ActiveICDD

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.cib.bimsage.icdd.activedata.ActiveICDD

  • public class ActiveICDD
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton used for storing the active ICDD Container used in the platform Provides functionality for saving the active ICDD in its save path Provides functionality for retrieving basic information about the ICDD
